Nighlight/Termitron::

They was arriving to the base, Nightlight said "We're Chivtrons and 
we are a neutral faction; until I know, we haven't commanders"and she 
added "I'm nervous 'cause other faction will attack us soon... and I 
have a bad feeling about it"

Suddenly a shot hit Termitron's leg and Nightlight saw that Train 
Wreck and his fellows had comeback, Nightlight shouted scared "To the 
base, Termitron, run to the base"

"No without you ladyship!!!!" answered Termitron

"Don't argue!!!!!" said Nightlight while she shot 25 energy balls 
against TRain Wreck
